mapper.select: select b.board_seq,b.user_seq,b.project_seq,b.board_category,b.board_title,b.board_content,b.complete_yn,b.create_date, u.id from board b left join user u on b.user_seq=u.user_seq where b.project_seq=#{projectSeq}

update board set board_content = #{boardContent}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, complete_yn = #{completeYn}, fileName = #{fileName}, realFileName = #{realFileName}, update_time = now() where board_seq = #{boardSeq}
select board.user_seq, user.id as id from user, board where board.user_seq = user.user_seq and board.user_seq=#{userSeq} and user.status='Y'

select b.board_seq,b.user_seq,b.project_seq,b.board_category,b.board_title,b.board_content,b.complete_yn,b.create_date, u.id from board b left join user u on b.user_seq=u.user_seq where b.project_seq=#{projectSeq} and b.complete_yn = 'N' order by b.board_seq desc limit 0,10
select count(*) from board where project_seq = #{projectSeq}

select b.board_seq,b.user_seq,b.project_seq,b.board_category,b.board_title,b.board_content,b.complete_yn,b.create_date, u.id from board b left join user u on b.user_seq=u.user_seq where b.project_seq=#{projectSeq} and b.board_category like concat('%',#{boardCategory},'%') and b.complete_yn like concat('%',#{completeYn},'%') and (b.board_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.board_title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or u.id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) order by board_seq desc limit #{startRowNum},#{viewRows};

select count(*) from board b left join user u on b.user_seq=u.user_seq where project_seq=#{projectSeq} and board_category like concat('%',#{boardCategory},'%') and complete_yn like concat('%',#{completeYn},'%') and (board_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or board_title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or u.id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
update board set fileName = "", realFileName = "" where board_seq = #{boardSeq}
